extendedInfo.description: Dirty Phrase Snatch!---Dirty Phrase snatch is a phrase guessing game for adults!Nothing starts off the night like sitting around with a group of your close friends, trying to describe a "Squish Mitten".  Nothing beats coming back from the bar (or frat party) and getting your friends to guess "Reservoir Tip".  Nothing beats Dirty Phrase Snatch!FEATURES:*Hundreds of hilarious ADULT words and phrases!*Different sounds for when a word is guessed or skipped, so you KNOW who's cheating!*Two modes: Classic mode with a timer, or a casual mode if you're just looking to relax*Look-up words on Urban Dictionary*Similar to Catch Phrase or Phrase Party, but with an ADULT word list!NOTE:Suggestions for phrases for this game came from all genders, creeds, races, and sexual orientations.  While some may find the words and phrases to be highly offensive, this game is intended for entertainment only and NOT as any sort of attack on any gender/race/creed/sexual orientation.  If you are easily offended you may want to reconsider playing this game!---Questions, comments or bug reports?epicallyawesomeapps@gmail.comTwitter: EAApps

reviews.title: Really fun find
reviews.comment: Great with the right group of people
reviews.author: David Fine
